item.create_dd.chromatic_compound.toolti: A Powerful Chromatic material that _Consumes Matter_.
item.create_dd.shadow_steel.tooltip.summ: A Chromatic material forged _in the Abyss Darkness_.
A Chromatic material forged _in the Cleansed Luminosity_.
A Chromatic material forged _in the Immense Energetic Force_.
item.create_dd.frozen_nugget.tooltip.sum: A speck of _frozen inspiration_ from your fantastic inventions.
A unusual of _inspiration_ from your fantastic inventions.
item.create_dd.experience_mass.tooltip.s: A quantity of _inspiration_ from your fantastic inventions.
block.create_dd.2_blade_fan.tooltip.summ: _Embellish_ your _Machines_ with this imposing Spinning Blades of Death! (Doesn't hurt by the way.)
block.create_dd.4_blade_fan.tooltip.summ: _Embellish_ your _Machines_ with this imposing Spinning Blades of Death! (Doesn't hurt by the way.)
block.create_dd.8_blade_fan.tooltip.summ: _Embellish_ your _Machines_ with this imposing Spinning Blades of Death! (Doesn't hurt by the way.)
block.create_dd.copycat_block.tooltip.su: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative block.
block.create_dd.copycat_block.tooltip.be: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.create_dd.copycat_slab.tooltip.sum: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative slab.
block.create_dd.copycat_slab.tooltip.beh: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.create_dd.bronze_drill.tooltip.sum: Acts like a _Mechanical Drill_ but _mines faster_!
block.create_dd.bronze_saw.tooltip.summa: Acts like a _Mechanical Saw_ but _mines faster_ and allows for _Bulk Sawing_!
item.create_dd.forest_ravager.tooltip.su: A Powerful axe that can _Deforest the Entire Land_!
item.create_dd.forest_ravager.tooltip.be: Act like the _Mechanical Saw_ that _cuts the Entire Tree down_
_No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.create_dd.deforester_saw.tooltip.su: A Powerful axe that can _Deforest the Entire Land_!
item.create_dd.deforester_saw.tooltip.be: Act like the _Mechanical Saw_ that _cuts the Entire Tree down_
_No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
